channel.title: "modwep" or "modring"
channel.description: Hello, I was playing an Allstar Source about 2 years ago, and I was an admin on it. I had a "glowing dagger" and a "perfect ring" and whenever i attacked something it killed it instantly. Does anyone know how to make the code for that? I would like to make a "perfect ring". Thanks!

item.title: "modwep" or "modring"
item.dc:creator: @deadlyhorror deadlyhorror
item.description:
@deadlyhorror wrote:

If you haven’t noticed,

anytime Glad to help!

Read full topic

item.title: "modwep" or "modring"
item.dc:creator: @GodexCAB GodexCAB
item.description:
@GodexCAB wrote:

[quote=“deadlyhorror, post:2, topic:516015”][quote author=GodexCAB link=topic=634273.msg4282715#msg4282715 date=1365916245]
Hello, I was playing an Allstar Source about 2 years ago, and I was an admin on it. I had a “glowing dagger” and a “perfect ring” and whenever i attacked something it killed it instantly. Does anyone know how to make the code for that? I would like to make a “perfect ring”.
Thanks!
[/quote]

I remember those weapons lol, but open item.cfg and search for ‘perfect_ring’, replace the whole line with this:

I believe the last 12 or so are the stats that it shows when you go to the equipment tab, like so if you ever wanna change something just find the item in there and then change those to whatever you want the stats to be and viola :)[/quote]

Thanks!

Read full topic
